programme.title: St-etienne vs Montpellier - French Ligue 2 - 2025/2026
programme.desc: Ligue 2 is the second division of French football. Ligue 2 is contested by 18 clubs, the league operates on a system of promotion and relegation with both Ligue 1 and the third division Championnat National. The teams play 34 games each, totaling 306 games in the season. The biggest games from each match Day are live and exclusive on beIN.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Fulham - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 24 - Mini Match

programme.title: Lamine Yamal - The Future Of Football
programme.desc: Lamine Yamal, a prodigy developed at La Masia, has risen at a remarkably young age to the world stage of football thanks to his talent, maturity and creativity. Through his rapid ascent, this documentary asks a key question : is he just an early phenomenon, or true embodiment of the future of modern football ?

programme.title: Ligue 1: Iconic Players Best of Blanc , Ibrahimovic and Niang in Ligue 1
programme.desc: Ligue 1 Legends, program talks about the main achievements and numbers of three legends played in French league. Laurent Blanc , Zlatan Ibrahimovic and Mamadou Niang.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Copenhagen - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Barcelona and Copenhagen’s only two previous meetings came in the group stage of the 2010-11 UEFA Champions League – Barcelona won 2-0 in the home fixture thanks to a Lionel Messi brace, before drawing 1-1 in the reverse fixture in Denmark. Copenhagen didn’t win any of their first 15 matches against Spanish teams in European competition, yet won their most recent one, versus Villarreal on MD6 of this season’s UEFA Champions League.

programme.title: Ligue 1 legends (Rai + Neymar) PSG PREVIOUS BRAZILIAN STARS Rai & Neymar
programme.desc: Many legends have had unforgettable competitions in French stadiums. In this program, we show you the best moments of Paris Saint-Germain stars Rai and Neymar.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Qarabağ - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Liverpool and Qarabag will meet for the first time in European competition – all three previous meetings between sides from England and Azerbaijan in the UEFA Champions League have been between Qarabag and Chelsea. Qarabag lost seven of their first eight meetings with English sides in Europe, but they did avoid defeat in the most recent one in the UEFA Champions League this season.

programme.title: EPL Netbusters 2025/2026
programme.desc: Highlights of the Premier League Matchweek from an alternative angle. A look back at every goal from every game using the best ISOs and Slow Motion angles.

programme.title: Paris Saint-Germain vs Newcastle United - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Paris SG and Newcastle’s only previous meetings came in the 2023-24 UEFA Champions League – the two sides drew their meeting at the Parc des Princes, after Eddie Howe’s side had won 4-1 in the first game at St. James’ Park. This will be Newcastle’s 10th away game against a French side in Europe, while they have only managed one victory from the previous nine : 4-0 v Sochaux in the UEFA Cup in November 2004.

programme.title: Benfica vs Real Madrid - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Despite having a combined 792 European Cup/UEFA Champions League matches between them, these teams have only met three times across the two competitions, and not since the 1964-65 quarter-finals. Benfica have won two of the previous three meetings between themselves and Real Madrid, while their one defeat came in the second leg of the 1964-65 quarter-finals ; a tie they still progressed from 6-3 on aggregate.

programme.desc: Many legends have had unforgettable competitions in French stadiums. In this program, we show you their best moments.

programme.title: Chelsea vs. West Ham United - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Chelsea have won their last four Premier League games against West Ham by an aggregate score of 15-2. It’s their longest winning run against the Hammers since a run of six between 2006 and 2008. West Ham have won just one of their last 19 Premier League away games against Chelsea, losing the last five in a row since a 1-0 victory in November 2019.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Copenhagen - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Barcelona and Copenhagen’s only two previous meetings came in the group stage of the 2010-11 UEFA Champions League – Barcelona won 2-0 in the home fixture thanks to a Lionel Messi brace, before drawing 1-1 in the reverse fixture in Denmark. Copenhagen didn’t win any of their first 15 matches against Spanish teams in European competition, yet won their most recent one, versus Villarreal on MD6 of this season’s UEFA Champions League.

programme.title: Ligue 1 legends (Rai + Neymar) PSG PREVIOUS BRAZILIAN STARS Rai & Neymar
programme.desc: Many legends have had unforgettable competitions in French stadiums. In this program, we show you the best moments of Paris Saint-Germain stars Rai and Neymar.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Qarabağ - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Liverpool and Qarabag will meet for the first time in European competition – all three previous meetings between sides from England and Azerbaijan in the UEFA Champions League have been between Qarabag and Chelsea. Qarabag lost seven of their first eight meetings with English sides in Europe, but they did avoid defeat in the most recent one in the UEFA Champions League this season.

programme.title: EPL Netbusters 2025/2026
programme.desc: Highlights of the Premier League Matchweek from an alternative angle. A look back at every goal from every game using the best ISOs and Slow Motion angles.

programme.title: Paris Saint-Germain vs Newcastle United - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Paris SG and Newcastle’s only previous meetings came in the 2023-24 UEFA Champions League – the two sides drew their meeting at the Parc des Princes, after Eddie Howe’s side had won 4-1 in the first game at St. James’ Park. This will be Newcastle’s 10th away game against a French side in Europe, while they have only managed one victory from the previous nine : 4-0 v Sochaux in the UEFA Cup in November 2004.

programme.title: Benfica vs Real Madrid - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Despite having a combined 792 European Cup/UEFA Champions League matches between them, these teams have only met three times across the two competitions, and not since the 1964-65 quarter-finals. Benfica have won two of the previous three meetings between themselves and Real Madrid, while their one defeat came in the second leg of the 1964-65 quarter-finals ; a tie they still progressed from 6-3 on aggregate.

programme.title: Athletic Club vs Sporting Clube de Portugal - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD8
programme.desc: This will be the fifth meeting between Athletic Club and Sporting CP, with the most recent coming in the 2011-12 UEFA Europa League semi-finals; Marcelo Bielsa’s Athletic won 4-3 on aggregate to reach the final, which remains one of only two European finals they’ve reached in their history. The home team has won in all four meetings between Athletic Club and Sporting CP, with Athletic’s two victories on home soil coming in November 1985 and April 2012.

programme.title: Athletic Club vs Sporting Clube de Portugal - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD8
programme.desc: This will be the fifth meeting between Athletic Club and Sporting CP, with the most recent coming in the 2011-12 UEFA Europa League semi-finals; Marcelo Bielsa’s Athletic won 4-3 on aggregate to reach the final, which remains one of only two European finals they’ve reached in their history. The home team has won in all four meetings between Athletic Club and Sporting CP, with Athletic’s two victories on home soil coming in November 1985 and April 2012.

programme.title: Borussia Dortmund vs Internazionale Milano - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD8
programme.desc: Borussia Dortmund and Internazionale have faced each other on six previous occasions in Europe, with the most frequent result being an Inter victory. The last meeting between Borussia Dortmund and Internazionale was a 3-2 victory for the German side in November 2019 – a game that Inter led 2-0 in at half time. This remains the only time that Dortmund have trailed by 2+ goals at half time of a European Cup/UEFA Champions League game and gone on to win, as well as the only time Inter have led by 2+ goals at the break and lost in those competitions.

programme.title: Lille vs Freiburg - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD8
programme.desc: Lille have never faced SC Freiburg previously – they have won just one out of 11 major European matches against German teams, a 3-1 win over Wolfsburg in December 2021 in the UEFA Champions League. Freiburg have won four of their five UEFA Europa League matches against French teams, including a 3-1 win over Nice earlier this season.

programme.title: Panathinaikos vs Roma - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD8
programme.desc: Panathinaikos have won each of their two prior European games against Roma, beating them 3-2 home and 3-2 away in a UEFA Europa League last 32 tie in 2009-10. Roma have drawn three of their five away European matches in Greece goalless and kept four clean sheets in five games – they did lose 3-2 to Panathinaikos in February 2010, however.

programme.title: FCSB vs Fenerbahçe - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD8
programme.desc: FCSB and Fenerbahçe have faced in the UEFA Europa League before, meeting twice in the 2009-10 group stage – the Turkish side won both matches. Fenerbahçe are unbeaten in their last four away matches in Romania in all European competition since losing 1-0 to Petrolul Ploiesti in October 1963 in the Cup Winners’ Cup.

programme.title: FCSB vs Fenerbahçe - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD8

programme.title: Pafos vs Slavia Praha - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD8
programme.desc: Pafos versus Slavia Prague will be the first ever European Cup/UEFA Champions League match played between teams from Cyprus and Czechia. This will be the first time Pafos have faced an opponent from Czechia in European competition, while Slavia Prague have only faced a Cypriot side in one previous campaign, being eliminated by APOEL Nicosia in qualifying for the 2017-18 UEFA Champions League.

programme.title: Genk vs Malmö FF - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD8
programme.desc: Genk and Malmö met in the 2018-19 UEFA Europa League group stage – the Belgian side won 2-0 at home, while there was 2-2 draw in Sweden. Malmö have never won a major European game against sides from Belgium, losing most recently against Union Saint-Gilloise in the 2022-23 UEFA Europa League.

programme.title: Genk vs Malmö FF - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD8

programme.title: Sturm Graz vs Brann - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD8
programme.desc: Sturm Graz and Brann have never met before in European competition – the Austrian side have won both of their previous home games against Norwegian teams, beating FK Haugesund and Bodø/Glimt in August 2019 and August 2025 respectively in European competition’s qualifiers. Brann were knocked out of UEFA Champions League qualifying by Austrian side FC RB Salzburg earlier this season 5-2 on aggregate, their only previous games against a team from Austria.

Montpellier vs Sant - Raphael - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Match For Hope - Qatar 2026
programme.desc: Chunkz won the first edition in 2024. Aboflah took his revenge in 2025. Now, in 2026, the two creator captains face each other for the third and final showdown, live from Ahmed bin Ali Stadium, Doha. All the funds go to support quality education for disadvantaged young people across the Middle East, Asia and Africa Match for Hope has raised over $19.5 million, giving thousands of children hope for a brighter future

The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Match For Hope - Qatar 2026
programme.desc: Chunkz won the first edition in 2024. Aboflah took his revenge in 2025. Now, in 2026, the two creator captains face each other for the third and final showdown, live from Ahmed bin Ali Stadium, Doha. All the funds go to support quality education for disadvantaged young people across the Middle East, Asia and Africa Match for Hope has raised over $19.5 million, giving thousands of children hope for a brighter future

programme.title: Paris vs Chambéry - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.desc: This week, SoAnne is hosted by HAC, the Le Havre football club. For the football challenge, it's a goalkeeper special featuring the club's three goalkeepers. programme.title: Atlético Petroleos (ANG) vs Simba SC (TAN)- CAF Champions League 2025/26 MD5
programme.desc: The CAF Champions League, is an annual club football competition organized by the Confederation of African Football (CAF) and contested by top-division African clubs. It is the most prestigious club competition in African football and is live and exclusive only on beIN. The current champions are Pyramids Football Club from Egypt.
